metadata.title: CVE-2023-43281 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Double Free vulnerability in Nothings Stb Image.h v.2.28 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file to thestbi_load_gif_main function.

criterions.comment: emscripten package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
libsfml package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
love package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
mame package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
visp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
